original_title: Nayana Wasalathilaka sworn in as MP
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Nayana Wasalathilaka took oaths as a Member of the Sri Lankan Parliament in the presence of Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena on Friday (12).

Nayana Wasalathilaka's name was published via gazette by the Election Commission on Thursday (11) night to fill the parliament seat left vacant following the resignation of SJB Member Chaminda Wijesiri earlier this week.
Sri Lanka intensifies Operation Yukthiya with Police deployment surge and stricter legal oversight.
Sri Lankan workers of two closed-down Jordan garment factories to be repatriated after legal proceedings
